page.title: 15Religion in our D-block #3
page.content: {The Kingdom Hall}in Craigie Road has an average congregation of about 150.It was built in August 1979 and follows the beliefs of{Jehovah's {Witness.}It has 10 elders who help the congregation and run the affairs of the church. When children become 15 years of age they are{baptised}in the swimming pool in Edinburgh or Hamilton. The church conducts the usual ceremonies relating to weddings and funerals, as do the other churches in our D-block. Their meetings are on Sunday mornings at 10.30 and on Thursday evenings at 7.pm. {The Church of God Kilmarnock}meets in Shortlees and has a much smaller congregation than the other churches. Their meetings are on Sunday, Breaking of Bread at 10.45.am. Sunday School at 1.00.pm. and Gospel at 6.30.pm. and a Prayer meeting on Thursday evenings.
